content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I am too busy to accompany my family.
I am sorry to hear that. It sounds like your family are feeling a bit overwhelmed about it. I know how hard it can be to go for a holiday.. What specifically has got you feeling that way?
I always plan to go home early but my boss always stops me from this.
I am sorry to hear that. It sounds like your boss has made it difficult to spend time with you without an alarm! Am I understanding correctly?
